Website Under Construction

Much like our network, our website is still under construction! Whilst we work to fill the site with useful information and nice pictures of our nationwide network, you'll notice several spots where things will be missing or are marked as "to be confirmed". We ask that you please bear with us whilst we work to progress the site to completion!

We connect Harlon

We're Harlonian National (HN) - Harlon's National Railway. We connect Harlon's cities, towns and coastlines, bringing communities like yours closer together.

Carousel items

  1. East Coast Mainline

    Information about the East Coast Mainline (ECML) connecting the City of Harlon with the City of Victoria and the Sealand region.

    east
  2. Network Map

    Keep a copy on your phone, in your pocket or on your wall - our official network map makes it easy to figure out how to get around our nationwide network!

    east
  3. Dynmap

    Find stations, landmarks and more and track your location in real time.

    east
  4. Wiki

    Find information on Harlon's online, crowdsourced encyclopaedia about our nationwide network that you can help contribute to!

    east
  5. Careers

    Find information about the well-paid and rewarding careers we offer that enable everyday Harlonians like you to play a crucial role in bringing our nation together.

    east
